title: Ultimate Footstep Interaction System Lite
description: Quickly add footprints(Decals) to your game in the LITE Version of Ultimate Footstep Interaction System without using anim notifies, the plugin will automatically detect when the characters feet touch the ground and apply footprints.
longDescription:
IMPORTANT: If you run into any issues or need help please reach out to me first or use the questions tab. The reviews section is not for troubleshooting. Products are tested by Epic Games and myself to be fully functional before publishing.


Free playable demo(Of Pro Version): itch.io link

Need Niagara, Camera Shake, and Sound Effect features? Check out the Pro Version: Pro Version

Need support or have questions? Join the discord: Discord link

Be sure to go over the documentation here: Written Documentation

Need something custom? Check out our studio services: https://www.komodobitgames.com/services


Setup footstep effects(Decals Only in LITE version) in just a few minutes with this plugin, It uses an alternative solution to anim notifies that automatically checks when a foot of the character mesh has touched the ground. No work is required on your end to get this working other than setting some values in the defaults panel of the component and assigning the skeletal mesh to track on begin play. It supports both first person and third person characters, along with physical materials.


This will work with any animation out of the box, you don't need to go through and setup anim notifies on every animation file you have. Simply add the component to your character, set the values you want, add your effects to a list, and it will do the rest for you.


If the plugin works well for you then please be sure to leave a review letting us know what you liked about it.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Use footstep effects(Decals) with any physical material you have in seconds and it will auto adjust if you don't use physical materials.
  • Code driven foot detection instead of anim notifies, this saves time and optimizes your project since this is written in C++ for over 10x performance compared to blueprints resulting in 0 FPS drops for footstep logic. The plugin is designed for blueprints so no c++ knowledge is required.
  • Supports both first person games(No feet to track) and third person games(With feet to track).
  • This is network replicated for easy multiplayer use. Any replicated character class with this component setup will have replicated effects automatically.

Code Modules:

  • Â Dynamic FootStep Effects - Runtime

Number of Blueprints: 2(Just for Demo Character)

Number of C++ Classes: 2

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, IOS, LInux, Android

Documentation: Google Docs

Important/Additional Notes: You will need to have your own textures for footsteps(Only the right foot) if you are going beyond the demo content.

releaseInfo.releaseNote: This version does not need to be updated, no new files have been added.
